translations: v.中伤；诽谤；背叛（traduce 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: We have been traduced in the press as xenophobic bigots.
sentences.translation: 我们已经被媒体诽谤为排外的顽固分子。

sentences.sentence: Benjamin: my colleague traduced me behind my back in order to get promoted. What a raw deal!
sentences.translation: 本杰明：同事为了升职在我背后中伤我。真卑鄙啊！
